review_blob: My favorite beer ever. This is all I drink in Texas in the fall. So sad to see it disappear from the shelves when the season is over.
beer_name: Sierra Nevada Harvest Wet Hop IPA - Northern Hemisphere

review_blob:
Poured from a bottle. Thick, creamy head that is long lasting. Has a deep amber color.
Flavor is very hoppy and citrusy. Aftertaste is slightly bitter. Overall, a decent beer for a cold day.
